overview: Roommates Lola, Oma and Rita are caught in a love web with their neighbors Bayo, Derrick and Afam. Lola is in a relationship with Derrick the playboy. Rita struggles to hide her job as an escort from her roommates while Bayoâ€™s uncle Richard helps Oma land her dream man. A game of pretense between Lola and Afam sparks a romance that causes problems for their friendships.
title: 3 is a Crowd
